name: PURDUE PHARMA L.P., et al., petitioners, v. UNITED STATES EX REL. Steven MAY and Angela Radcliffe.
name_abbreviation: Purdue Pharma L.P. v. United States ex rel. May

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
PURDUE PHARMA L.P., et al., petitioners,
v.

opinions.text: Motion of The Pharmaceuticals Research and Manufacturers of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiaegranted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiaegranted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
